think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the knob 'effective_cache_size'. 2. Determine if it has any special values that alter its normal behavior. 3. Check the documentation for PostgreSQL to see if -1 or 0 or any other specific value is defined as a special value for this knob. 4. Conclude whether it behaves differently when set to these special values compared to its regular numerical range.
